rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a small waiting area and storage for footwear. Includes a foyer style design that leads to the main living spaces.
Open plan living space with floor-to-ceiling windows along one wall for natural light. Features a Bohemian interior design style with rich textures and vibrant colors.
Adjacent to the living room for easy transition. Incorporates Bohemian decor elements and ample seating area.
Modern yet farmhouse style kitchen with rustic finishes, integrated appliances, and open shelving. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide a bright workspace.
ensuite bathroom for the living area with water-saving fixtures and Bohemian decor accents.
Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor design. Features ample space for vehicles and storage along with a service entrance leading to the servant quarters.
A modestly sized area dedicated to the servants. Includes a small kitchenette and living space while ensuring privacy.

openings.description: A large front door with a glass panel for natural light. Aligns with Vastu principles by providing entry facing the auspicious direction.
Automated double garage door to provide seamless access for vehicles. Designed in keeping with modern aesthetics and local building norms.
Floor-to-ceiling windows along the living room wall to maximize natural light and enhance ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
Floor-to-ceiling window in the kitchen area to provide ample daylight and improve energy efficiency.
